Name: Hum Drum Experiences
About the game: Experience above and beyond the most unconventional visual-novel based RPG, built with a unique 3D environment just for you! 'But Thou Must!' Take on the role of a person hovering between life and death. Journey through a vibrant world while collecting masks, which help you along in your adventure. Moral ambiguity, questionable ethics and fully-fleshed out characters await in this new RPG adventure. 'No really... Thou Must!' Features: Meet Handsome, the body pillow which finds you insanely attractive. Yes, this is the first feature we developed. No, we donâ€™t regret listing it as such! Journey through a wide variety of interesting new worlds as you discover secrets! Become a master of the unique combat system, designed to keep you on your toes and anxious! Influence battle by unlocking new abilities or by purchasing items (-Internal Screaming-) Satisfy your need to collect by finding various masks, which are also used to unlock new powers in and out of combat. Seek out, confront and challenge several hidden bosses. Over 700+ lines of unique dialogue. The denizens of this world are living and breathing the story along with you as you progress through every single square inch of the game. Level up your stats at your own pace. No leveling requirements means you create your own difficulty as you play. In fact, leveling is completely optional! Enjoy interacting with a wide range of quirky and unusual characters displaying humor, personality, life crises and their own jobs to do. Immerse yourself into a story filled with moral choices, questionable ethics and plenty of humor, drama and everything in between.
